Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.interceptors

Interface Summary
ActionInterceptor Intercepts one or more of the phases that cause an action to be executed.
 

Class Summary
ActionSkipper Skips both the creation and execution of an intercepted action.
WriterReplacer An action interceptor that will replace the writer that will be used by the action that it contributes to.
 

Exception Summary
InterceptionException Thrown by an interceptor when something goes wrong during intercepting.
